item.title: Google Colab
item.description:
This blog post will be centred about(and written on), Google Colab. The free, hyper-powerful program built by Google that allows people to take their work to a higher level.

Google Colab itself allows users, with Google accounts, to work on their servers, rather than from their machines. A helpful …

item.title: Exploratory Analysis
